website_summaries.verdict: These innovative anti-colic bottles use a sophisticated air reduction system to reduce painful colic symptoms. Effective, but cleaning can be complicated.
pros: Three piece airflow system directs air bubbles away from milk, drastically reducing gas and spit up
Heat sensing tube changes color to indicate temperature
Naturally shaped nipple improves latch and is readily accepted by most breastfed babies
Conveniently comes with bottles and nipples of varying sizes as well as extra venting tubes
cons: Multiple components make cleaning and assembling a chore

customer_reviews.title: IF YOUR BOTTLE LEAKS OR NIPPLE COLLAPSES >>>
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these bottles. I've tried every other brand out there. I mean that very literally. If your bottle leaks or nipple collapses it's super easy to fix. Because of the way these bottles are made you have to check the vent at the bottom of the insert peice. Pinch it to make sure it's not stuck together . This will keep the nipple from collapsing. Dishwashers especially cause the vent to stick together and not let air out. If your bottle is leaking. You CAN NOT heat up your bottle with the cap over the nipple. Just keep the cap off and all leaking should be cured :) good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Ian S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buyers remorse.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set very excited because of the great reviews. I'm very disappointed in this product as it does not compare to other brands. I supplement so I bottle feed several times a day and everytime I use one of these bottles my baby ends up choking on the formula and it spills out everywhere. I am using the correct stage 1 nipples as well. I have tried the Phillips brand and Dr. Brown brand and my baby does not have any trouble with these bottles, no choking and no spillage with these two. My suggestion is to buy single bottles from a couple different brands to see what works best for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Emily White

customer_reviews.title: leaks
customer_reviews.text: these poor milk right out of the cap. I've tried everything to make it stop. I read not to warm the bottle with the lid on.. still leaks. I emailed the company, and didnt recieve a response. i was super excited to use these, since they seem to be a popular brand. but I give up trying to make them work, and I'm returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Saved my sanity
customer_reviews.text: Our little man was struggling to achieve a pain free latch when breastfeeding. So when our lactation specialist told my wife that she needed to take a two-week breastfeeding break to let her nipples heal, we went to bottle feeding. We heard horror stories of babies developing “bottle preferences” so we originally went with the Dr. B’s bottles. But we soon discovered that if our little man has a latch problem, a non breast shape nipple aggravates the problem which causes 45 minute AM feeding sessions. Let’s just say that I ordered these bottles at 2AM with a crying baby in my arms and it was the best desision I’ve made :)
customer_reviews.author: Shotty B

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many bottles for my breastfed baby and none of them worked, he just wouldn't drink. I tried, Dr. brown, Adiri (biggest waste of money) Evenflo, avent. I then switched to tomme tippee the regular bottles and even though he liked them he will get too many gases and the 0 nipple flow was to much. But this anti-colic bottle works amazing, he loves the nipple and doesn't get as much gas as he did with the normal tomee tippee, they are easy to clean and easy to grab. Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: 5 peices per bottle, no slit in vent
customer_reviews.text: These take so long to clean! When I first read people saying that I was like yeah... you gotta put in the work. Wow these are so much work! Also two of the air vent star things did not have holes in then. I only found that out after I explored the bottle after the nipple collapses for the 10th time during a feeding. I ended up just taking scissors and making my own slit in then. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite tommee tippee product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always loved tommee tippee products; however, these aren’t my favorite at all. When our son was first born he had some issues expelling gas so I was excited to try the anti-colic bottles. To my surprise, they didn’t work as well as I was expecting. I never saw the air moving up the straw and our son still ended up with a lot of gas. On top of that, I really can’t stand all the parts to clean. It takes forever to wash bottle and my husband and I do rock, paper, scissors to see who is washing bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Ok bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of tommee tippee bottles but these are ok. The colic inserts are a little difficult to put on and off you have to make sure to hear a snap or it will come out in the bottle while they eat. The nipple kind of indents itself in the bottle so if they try to eat too fast the nipple basically goes in the bottle. I have also had some trouble with them leaking between the nipple and ring that connects to the bottle while they eat.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cole

customer_reviews.title: Best Bottle ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bottle that worked when I was trying to bottle feed and breast my child. Until I found this bottle about 6 weeks into breastfeeding, my child would not go back and forth and would not latch. This bottle not only helps prevent colic, it has the best shaped nipple. So real like, and covers your child's mouth and cheek like skin. BUY ONLY THIS BRAND, I promise it will work and you will never go back! I now buy this bottle and put it in every baby gift I give now. Everyone I have ever given it to loves it and doesn't bother using any other bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Medlock

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with these bottles. My son loves the nipple shape but these bottles randomly leak and it's really frustrating figuring it out. I suspect it's the anti colic device inside but the bottle cannot work without the device inside because it'll get too loose for the cap. I regret not going with the regular bottles instead of anti colic. Just thought this was an added plus since it's shaped like the natural nipple bottles plus anti colic.
customer_reviews.author: MBV

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! BEST bottles!
customer_reviews.text: these bottles are great!! our first baby had acid reflux so we were so nervous for our second, but she didn't have it and she VERy rarely spits up and I really believe these bottles help so much with that! they will leak if you try to use it without the straw insert thing and there are a few more parts to wast but they pop together easily and clean easily as well. She's now a bit older and I bought the below handles and they fit perfect, no leaks or anything. She can now feed herself most of the time... when she feels like it haha
customer_reviews.author: Penny B.

customer_reviews.title: Tommy Tippee is by far my favorite brand of bottle
customer_reviews.text: Tommy Tippee is by far my favorite brand of bottle. The nipples are close to a mother's nipple, moreso than I have found in other bottles. In my daycare and personal experience, these bottles have been the preferred bottle by breastfed babies. I like that this set comes with two different sizes however I would recommend purchasing the larger bottles as they can hold more liquid and are able to get more use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bottles my son does well on and doesn't get a ton of air causing horrible gas in his tummy. I highly recommend these for babies with colic or milk protein/soy allergies! The nipples are more like a breast nipple, wide so they aren't sucking in air on the side of their mouth. They are also fairly easy to clean even though the have a lot of parts.
customer_reviews.author: LMHodne

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $ and the extra work
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived, I was extremely skeptical. All these parts? Is it really worth the extra work (washing) and are they really that much better than my $2 non-name-brand bottles? YES. My 5 month old used to get the hiccups multiple times daily, and was very burpy all the time. Now, I can honestly say I don't remember the last time she got the hiccups and her burps are tiny these days. Definitely worth the work and money. Baby loves them, I've bought 3 sets now.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Best bottles to reduce gas, best nipple latch
customer_reviews.text: We've been struggling with our newborn having gas and making her reflux worse/she would be up all night crying from trying to pass gas. We tried the avent bottles, dr browns (gave her the most gas), nuk, munchkin latch; tommee tippee were her favorite to latch onto as well as the best for her gas/colic!! And to buy the newborn set and get as many bottles and replacement parts as we did.. you can't beat that deal. We do hate having to pinch the valve open after mixing the bottle sometimes, but would rather trade that for our uncomfortable and screaming baby. These are a must try for all new moms!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Moncada

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: The nipples suck in as the baby is feeding which cause messy clothes and milk dripping under the neck. This glitch also causes the baby to get air if you decide to buy them you will see.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love the bottle, wrong nipple!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these bottles! When I ordered them the box as well as the description said these were 0+ month meaning slow flow nipple. That is not the case I am both bottle feeding and breastfeeding so I would need a bottle that mimics the flow of breast milk and these come out way to fast my baby tends to choke. The number that’s on the nipple says 1 which had me confused since the box has 0+ . Love the bottle just the wrong nipple
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: First off not bad bottles they definitely help with colic but the bottles leak everywhere if the pieces aren't on right or if the slit in the star gets too big then it leaks everywhere and you can't use it. The nipple gets sucked in frequently then my baby can't get formula or makes a huge mess on herself trying to get it out. Has its flaws but my baby doesn't have colic anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Keeosha Mae

customer_reviews.title: Fix the flaws
customer_reviews.text: My review is about what I don’t like about the product but it’s not to be confused, I ordered these twice and I like them. However, some, not all of the bottles have issues and I don’t know why but I HATE that some of the nipples sinks in while I’m feeding my baby. I have to stop and pull the nipple back out. It’s super annoying. You try taking a bottle out of a hungry baby’s mouth! Sometimes it also leaks when feeding too. Makes a whole mess on my floor, my baby and me. These flaws should be corrected and it would probably be the perfect bottle
customer_reviews.author: Tasia

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite bubbas!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bottle brand for my son! These have been great, helped his colicky symptoms a lot! Now that he is a little older he does fine with the regular tommee tippee bottles too! There are a lot of parts to wash on these but it is worth it if you want to keep your baby’s belly happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Half of these drip from poor seal
customer_reviews.text: Every time we use these they drip large amounts (min 1 oz) because the lids are not sealing well, the lid is on as tight as you can get it and all the interior parts are in place and secure. Half of these I have set aside because they leak so much and every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Air pressure technology doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: These do not work well at all. The air still gets trapped inside and causes pressure in the nipple area which makes it collapse. I went with Dr. Browns wide mouth, air flow bottles and they are amazing! I really wanted to like these but they just didnt work well.
customer_reviews.author: A.sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Nipple collapsed at every feeding
customer_reviews.text: We were using the regular Tommee Tippee bottles, which worked pretty well. I was just searching for a bottle that might help to reduce his air intake a bit. Because we had luck with the regular Tommee Tippee's I thought these would be great. Unfortunately, every time we fed our baby with one of these bottles the nipple collapsed. We didn't have that problem at all with the regular Tommee Tippee's. I made sure the vent was open and tried a few other things, but it still collapsed every time. We had a similar problem with the Advent bottles. In the end, we went back to the regular Tommee Tippee's and the Playtex Ventaire.
customer_reviews.author: LG78

customer_reviews.title: Small problem, but easily fixed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected! I had the problem with the star valves at the bottom not being opened, but don’t fret!!! It’s a super easy fix, the lines are already perforated and a small kitchen knife can easily fix it. Our little one isn’t here so I’m not sure if it leaks or not, but I tested it with water and had no leakage problems. Great bang for your buck and I can’t wait to use them!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Busby

customer_reviews.title: Cute bottle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my gassy newborn. Still feel like the flow is a bit strong for him but the bootle looks and feels great. I like the color changing feature that shows the temp of the bottle if it's too hot! Great if you have to warm up milk or formula.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My 3month old cant drink from these bottles. I find it weird because we have other tomme bottles and she drinks from them fine. But with these, the nipple sink in and she loses her grip. It's very frustrating to her that she has to stop and wait for the nipple to catch air and pop back out
customer_reviews.author: Khiantia B.

customer_reviews.title: Just a normal bottle with extra parts that cause problems
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the hype or $. There just normal bottles nothing fancy really. Does not help with baby sucking air through the bottle. The heat indicator is nice so that’s a plus but it’s a pain making sure that part is on the bottle correctly so the lid is on right and the bottle does not leak. I guess it’s just too much to deal with. Put the heat indicator on the inside of the bottle and make it so you can’t remove it. That would be better and less hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, manufacturing probelm
customer_reviews.text: Out of 6 bottles I ordered, there was no slit on the valve. The slit is what let's the air in otder to make this bottle anti-colic. This is a serious manufacturing problem. I am returning the bottles. I notified the manufacturer about it. He gavr me somr instructions that were suppose to make the slit re-appear. It didn't. Serious manufacturing problem.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Our Baby Boy has NEVER Had Colic!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this brand and these bottles do the trick. They are also super cute, and we can change out the nipples to the next size as needed. Our baby is almost 7 months old and has not had one issue with feeding or colic from these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Lin and Kurt Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in march, I had my baby in June and only unboxed these about two weeks ago only to find out that these bottles actually sucks in when my baby tries to suck and he finds it frustrating and cries and I feel his pain. My friend told me she had the same problem with the same kind of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Nkiruka

customer_reviews.title: Dr. Brown are much better!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for 3 months and dealt with horrific gas and colick. After 3 months of no sleep and a miserable baby I switched the Dr. Brown and saw improvement with gas almost immediately. Within 2 days had a completely different baby. I wish I had used Dr. Brown much sooner. The bottles themselves are good and work but I do not think the “anti colick” function really works on this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle nipple almost same as the breast
customer_reviews.text: I used a lot of bottles before and my daughter reject almost of the bottle. This bottle nipple really mimics my breast so it really works for my daughter! I’m glad i did my research and found this bottle brand. However, the cleaning part is a bit hard because the bottle has a lot of parts.
customer_reviews.author: syai_chan

customer_reviews.title: They worked fine for the first few uses
customer_reviews.text: They worked fine for the first few uses. Now, nipples collapse, we have to adjust the assembly during feedings, & press in sides of nipples to allow air flow. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I donated these and felt and they are such awful bottles.
customer_reviews.text: These leak. Like not a little bit, no these LEAK to where the pour water or formula everywhere. We have the regular Tommie Tippies and love them. But I HATE these bottles. Huge waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Alana Paige Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A good bottle
customer_reviews.text: We got these for our daughter who has Colic, and I’m not sure if I see a difference in her has, but she does like the bottles and I love that there’s a temperature strip inside so you don’t warm it up too much.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Danzer

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for newborns - coz they require size 0 nipples which cannot be even bought seperately.
customer_reviews.text: Says Newborn starter kit. But has no 'extra slow flow' or size 0 nipple a newborn requires. Our doc insisted that we use a size 0 nipple for a Newborn. And this starter kit comes only with size 1. Size 1 flow was too fast for our Newborn. And worst part is there are no size 0 nipples for the anti colic system that can be bought. So had to buy a whole set of new bottles.
customer_reviews.author: pramodh

customer_reviews.title: Something is off
customer_reviews.text: The ones I’ve bought in the store eventually leak, because the top part get deformed, but these leaked in a couple of weeks! The store bought ones were at least 6 months before leaking. So maybe these are a knockoff? I don’t know but they weren’t as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good design on paper but useless practically
customer_reviews.text: Not very effective in venting negative pressure... the rubber valve gets torn soon and whole bottle becomes useless as milk starts to flow back into the vent tube through that enlarged valve ...
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Received with one bottle defect. I vent works some ...
customer_reviews.text: Received with one bottle defect. I vent works some of the time. My newborn still swallows air. I see many bubbles in the bottle despite following the directions of making sure the slit is open. 50% of the time, the nipple collapses. I would not buy again. Too many parts to clean just to have it not always work.
customer_reviews.author: Essa Hlontor

customer_reviews.title: Works great for colic kids..great quality and superb shape
customer_reviews.text: We are big fans of tommee tippee. these anti colic bottles work great. the share of the bottle and nipple are very helpful for the little one
customer_reviews.author: ANKY009

customer_reviews.title: Great for acid reflux
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these because my second daughter had a bit of acid reflux. I’ve been a long time consumer of tommee tippee and when I saw these I had to buy them. Of course the cleaning is a bit more tedious bc of all the small parts, but it’s worth it bc it helps with the acid reflux.
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Finckbeiner

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: Way too big for my baby's mouth and the nipple collapses all the time. I bought s ton, but had to go back to Dr. Browns.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend the bottles for these reasons
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with these bottles. There are many complaints.. I bought this as my baby is gassy...It didn't help. So The very purpose of this is defeated.. Ok. Nipple collapses in during feeding. From the nipple ring milk leaks..wasting a lot of previous breast milk.and milk flows too fast which my baby can't handle and she cries off and makes her more gassy.. I used the regular bottles for years for my elder one and it was working fine with none of these issues.. And at the last too many items with this bottle assembling And washing a pain.. There's zero use with these bottles..baby not happy and makes you frustrated..this is such a poor design and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain to clean and did not help with colic
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my daughter had horrible colic. I read some great reviews and maybe they work for other people but they did nothing to help my daughters colic. Also, they were a pain to clean. We ended up purchasing the Playtex drop in bottles and they worked that night.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the worst bottle on the market! They come with no holes in the star insert and then once the company sends new ones the bottles leaks. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dis-a-poin-ted!! Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The nipples on these bottles are awfully fast. My 11 day old does not like them compared to the older , white-collared bottles. We’re so very upset that we purchased these bottles. We’re now looking to try to purchase just the older version, white collars but not having any luck. We’re hoping Tommy Tippee makes this right because their new product is not the same as their old. Simply does. It Compare. Again, would not recommend and extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brandon guillen

customer_reviews.title: Best bottles I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our now 2 year old when she was just born. These bottles made our lives so much easier. Our poor baby girl seemed to suffer from gas no matter what kind of bottles we used, up until we found these. The bottle brush that came with them cleaned every little part perfectly, and the binky that came with it turned out to be the only kind our little girl would even consider using. Definitely would recommend these bottles to anyone and everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Howard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I see is that the nipple collapses while baby girl is eating, BUT I also know that is due to the fact that while she is eating she is getting NO air! My baby has gas issues since day 1 and these bottles have been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend these to a friend
customer_reviews.text: We are still on the fence with these bottles. one of the 5 oz bottles didn't have a hole in the stem though the others also didn't seem to alleviate the air in the bottle. Also with the shape of the bottle, milk and water when cleaning, gets stuck in the bubble around the neck. I would not recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Only buy as a last resort
customer_reviews.text: So many parts they were a huge pain in the butt. If you also have closer to nature you have to pay such close attention to the tops because they are almost identical but not interchangeable. I ended up leaving these at my mom’s cause I didn’t want to deal.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy McIntyre Lingo

customer_reviews.title: Overall favorite. Switch anti colic nipple for original T.T. Nipple
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these bottles! Especially the heat sensing stick! They are easy for our baby to hold, easy to clean and assemble.. the only reason I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 is because the nipple on this bottle does collapse easily. I’ve had to switch the anti colic nipples out for the original tommy tipper nipples with the air vent. That seems to work much better! But overall these are definitely our favorite bottles.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly overpeck

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for us
customer_reviews.text: So many parts to clean! The nipple kept caving in and my baby ended up swallowing more air. Also the shape is ridiculous. I really wanted to like these bottles but ended up putting them away after 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: eleonora

customer_reviews.title: No leak, helps prevent colic and not too hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: Used these with our first son and were perfect so ordered for our second. Came in great packaging with all pieces as expected. I love that the product gives you multiple nipple options as well with slow or premise flow
customer_reviews.author: chanel

customer_reviews.title: These are our least favorite bottles (with Dr Brown's being the favorite so far)
customer_reviews.text: These are our least favorite bottles (with Dr Brown's being the favorite so far). There are so many pieces to clean and you constantly have to take the bottle out of baby's mouth while feeding so the nipple can pop back up after having all of the air sucked out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.text: I like tommee tippee, but did not like these bottles. They don't help keep air out and are a pain to clean.
customer_reviews.author: candise Hood

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my baby and colic doesn’t leak out of the nipple just sucks that there’s so many pieces to clean but it’s pretty easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: as natural as breastfeeding
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my home and my baby is breastfed . I did not want to have any problems between breastfeeding and bottle feeding . I analyzed the different bottles that are on the market and decided to buy bottles " Tommee Tipee Sensitive Tummy " and I do not regret my choice. My baby has not had any problems, when I 'm home he breastfeeds and when I am out and he is fed with a bottle, in fact he does not accept another bottle. The anti colic system is excellent , my baby has never suffered from colic , he has fed you with this bottle from six months ago .
customer_reviews.author: marcela acevedo palacios

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: The worst .. they leaked and the baby chokes with the. Reached out to them and was very disappointed . Not buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: t.isasc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for gassy babies
customer_reviews.text: My son was having horrible gas pains from our other bottles pouring too fast but regular slow flows weren’t fast enough for him. These are perfect and has completely stopped his gas pain!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzeehutch

customer_reviews.title: Great product but just not for our baby
customer_reviews.text: Ended up changing brands due to repeating colic issues. Went with something a bit more expensive but never had issues after that.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary C Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are horrible. They leak every time I take it out of my daughter's mouth, and jot from the nipple. It leaked from the side. I was warming the bottle in a hot cup of water and I looked and the water had milk in it. I only put 4 oz in the bottles so it's not like it's to full. I would not reccomend them I would just go with the plain tommee tippee bottles. The anti colic doesnt even help my daughter she is still fussy after feeds.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not for newborns
customer_reviews.text: These bottles smoosh a newborns face and the nipple folds up in their mouth making the milk pool up so much that they can’t swallow it fast enough. So they waste it every where. These bottles are def for bigger babies...not newborns even though we for the level 1 nipples.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought three sets of these and when the baby ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three sets of these and when the baby arrived and we started using them i was surprised that the milk leaks out as if its open .. the reviews was high but the reality was disappointing
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Labels came off within a few washes
customer_reviews.text: They are ok.... after a few washed the labels for oz. started coming off! I wash all bottles by hand with warm soapy water. I ended up contacting Tommee Tippee and they replaced the defective bottles . I feel like the labels shouldn't come off within a few washes they are clearing going to be washed often.
customer_reviews.author: AshChen17

customer_reviews.title: love the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: love the price and quality, this is for my 2nd child, my first one used tomme tippee he was a colic baby and works perfectly for him!! so as soon as i saw this deal I just take advantage of it... I paid with my first child just for 3 bottles ($30 on sale)... so 6 for $23 OMG was a great deal!!! I recommend you this eyes closed!!! believe me.
customer_reviews.author: J.O

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Though the nipple is more breast shaped, round, than others the bottles themselves do not allow for all the milk to flow easily towards the nipple.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great for tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: These bottles have been great for my little. She had alot of stomach problems when she was first born and they helped so much. She's now 16 months and I just keep using them to be safe
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maso

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed the valve tube system up until 5 months when the vent tube cap ripped and was causing the bottle to leak milk. I would strongly recommend purchasing the bottles without the valve system because these come with bigger nipple rings which you can't use without the valve system.( makes it harder to switch to other bottles) I still use the bottle itself but I purchased new (normal) nipple rings to use with these bottles.
customer_reviews.author: delarosa

customer_reviews.title: Nipple flow is very fast!
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept of the temp gage. However the nipple flow is fast so if you are breastfeeding as well, baby will get confused or mad at the difference in flow.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Reed

customer_reviews.title: Arrived used, with milk residue inside
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible. Arrived clearly used, with milk residue inside. This is a baby product, and such things should not be happening.
customer_reviews.author: derevo

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle for us.
customer_reviews.text: Work well for my little guy. Clean up nicely. Lots of trade out parts for easy replacement as needed. Love that they let air in as to not create a vacume.
customer_reviews.author: ashley west

customer_reviews.title: They may leak!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these bottles because we read they were good for breastfeeding babies to transition. This is true however, they leak. No matter how many times we adjust the lid, they still leak. We’ve tried all the recommended techniques and even purchased more bottles thinking we got a defective set. Still leaks & it’s so frustrating. No momma likes to waste breast milk!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my first daughter. All the little parts are a pain though, so we upgraded to the newer tommee tippee bottles when my son was born.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bartig

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE and LEAKED
customer_reviews.text: Too many hard-to-clean components and one of the bottles did not have the vent hole in the bottom like it was supposed to. I actually cut it to look like the other one but even then neither bottle really worked as advertised. Plus they leaked horribly. I was forced to throw them away. I learned my lesson about bottles that were too gadget-y.
customer_reviews.author: Kamela Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle!
customer_reviews.text: We went through at least 10 bottles with my daughter. She fought taking a bottle and was struggling eating at daycare. Once we found this bottle her intake at daycare was 5 times what she had been taking! This is the only bottle she will take and helps so much with her gas!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont by it online
customer_reviews.text: They are really good already used it before and am confident with the brand but seems there is something wrong with it when u get it online from amazon so if unreally want it get it from the store, as after using it for couple of weeks all of it start to leak
customer_reviews.author: Raed saleh

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: My baby doesn't like Avent's shape. Found this one works for her. Super Glad!!!
customer_reviews.author: htoochar

customer_reviews.title: My Baby really like the Tommee Tippee closer to Nature
customer_reviews.text: My Baby really like the Tommee Tippee closer to Nature. the only thing why I don't vote 5 stars is because I have one bottle that leaks, apparently the anti-colic system is damaged and leaks milk while warming up and while feeding.
customer_reviews.author: Heriberto Luna Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice bottle, but didnt last long
customer_reviews.text: after 2 week of using this, it started to leak through. Unfortunately its was both bottles. I had to throw it way. I will never buy this brand again. waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Rodline Prime

customer_reviews.title: Regular bottles over these
customer_reviews.text: These bottles don’t seem to help with my son’s gas. They often leak & have a lot of parts to clean. I like the regular bottles better.
customer_reviews.author: Chas6

customer_reviews.title: Worst expensive bottles
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to buy a decent bottle for my baby and decided to buy these bottles. I have to say they are the worst bottles i.ve had, i mean even walmart great value bottles are better made. These bottles leak all over and have so many parts to them. I spend way more then i should have on these bottles. But i wanted to make sure to let others know before buying them. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: oe

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage
customer_reviews.text: These bottles are garbage. No matter what I did, they leaked. I bought them 3 different times thinking it was me, but they all leaked. It's no fun getting covered in milk at 2am. Definitely will be throwing them away as soon as I get a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: These are the only bottles my son will take now. They hold more than other bottles and they really help cut down on my sons spit up. They help reduce the air in his stomach and work amazingly.
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Walker

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave these as a gift I've heard good feed back on them but I think they are expensive. I used Nuk brand myself and lobed it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean due to their shape and size. On the bad side, they are a little harder to hold due to their shape and size. Overall I'm very pleased with these bottles. I haven't encountered any issues. I feel my baby likes these bottles better than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous bottles for babies with gas problems. We have an aggressive eater and he would get gas bubbles, the se bottles reduced the gas build up.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Foster

customer_reviews.title: Works For Us
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome bottles, especially if you alternate between breastfeeding and bottles of breast milk as I do. My baby took to them well and had no nipple confusion. Bonus points for being dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Baby
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and daughter-in-law they really like this series of bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Special Tommee Tippee Bottles for Colic
customer_reviews.text: The nipple gets stuck together when my granddaughter sucks her formula! This doesn’t happen with other Tommee Tippee bottles! We really like them!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Makes a lot difference! Our newborn was very gassy ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes a lot difference! Our newborn was very gassy. I pump and have to use bottles. so we decided to give them a try. Was not expecting it working but now using only them to feed my already three month old baby. Yes it was collapsing a lot in the beginning but first u just pull it out before it collapses so u do it four to five times during feeding and later i think when baby gets stronger it is not collapsing at all. Anyway it worked for us!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Box was opened and I could tell it was a returned product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P

customer_reviews.title: Great bottles
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bottles. I have tried several but these are the only ones that work for my son. They are so easy to clean...all peuces come apart and are easy to put back together.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla Campbell

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the nipple collapsing so i googled it and the small clear piece that goes on the end of the tube is suppose to have a slit in it. None of mine did so i had to cut one myself. Alot of pieces to clean, and they leak so bad. I have no idea why...however i love the nipple on them. My daughter has no issues switching from breast to bottle.
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Too many parts to clean
customer_reviews.text: My baby hates these and way too many pieces to clean. Nipple is really too long for a breastfeeding baby.
customer_reviews.author: kitana2929

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen a huge difference between these and the original bottles. A little annoying because prior to EVERY feeding you are supposed to open this little slit. Yeah right! Who can remember that with a screaming baby in your sleep deprived ear at 3am. Plus, the little temperature reading sucks! It takes so long to turn blue (safe for feeding) that if solely relied upon, your milk becomes cold. It's good for letting you know if it's too hot and that's it. Not worth it ! Try Phillips Avent anti-colic bottles with the natural nipple.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these bottles
customer_reviews.text: My son had surgery at 4 weeks so I need a bottle that would will help him drink his milk. I like these bottles. My son is 5 months old he still use these bottles but with a different nipple part.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: How hot is the milk!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice , light and has a trigger inside for indicating the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Latifa

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite bottles
customer_reviews.text: We love these bottles and so does our little one! Easy to use and it seems like the anti-colic helps our little one. Plus, the heat sensing technology is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: kleonard1122

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles and love this color they do not have this color in stores
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Best for breastfed baby, don’t leak
customer_reviews.text: Love these bottles! The only ones my breastfed baby would take! They don’t leak, but you do have to have the middle part in place so it doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Igarashi

product_meta.title: Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic Newborn Baby Bottle Feeding Set, Heat Sensing Technology, BPA-Free
product_meta.description: Size:Gift Set 1There’s nothing a parent wants more than for their baby to be comfortable. That’s why we’ve combined our award-winning breast-like nipple with the latest in anti-colic innovation to create the new Tommee Tippee Advanced Anti-Colic bottle. The unique 3-piece anti-colic technology draws air away from milk while the star valve keeps milk from traveling up the tube meaning 80% less gas, spit-up and fussing*, and 100% more smiles. Plus, a built-in heat sensing straw gives you extra reassurance that your milk is just the right temperature so both you and baby can feed comfortably. Helping you #ParentOn *80% less colic—80% of the 210 parents we consulted with who tried this anti-colic bottle agreed that it had successfully reduced colic symptoms **Guaranteed acceptance—92% of more than 1200 parents who used our bottle nipple with their baby recalled that they accepted it within the first 3 attempts. (June 2017)
feature_bullets: Designed to reduce colic symptoms for less gas, less spit up and less discomfort
Unique 3-piece anti-colic straw draws air away from milk Star valve prevents milk traveling back up the tubeso no leaks and thats a promise
Heat sensing technology turns straw pink when babys milk is too hot
Award-winning breast-like nipple for natural latch and guaranteed acceptance**
BPA-free and phthalate-free for ultimate reassurance
This Newborn Bottle Set contains 3 x 9 oz. Advanced Anti-Colic Bottles, 3 x 5 oz. Advanced Anti-Colic Bottles, 2 x Medium Flow Advanced Anti-Colic Nipples and 2 x Spare Advanced Anti-Colic Valves

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,750 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
